page.title: 06WILMSLOW PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
{Games: Ticky Nick,Hop Scotch,Budge,Bull Dog, Port and Starboard,Blocky Off. {Playground Terms: { To tick,}to touch your opponent in a catching game. { Barly,}to be temporarily out of the game. { How to play Blocky Off.
The rules for{Blocky Off}are like those for Hide and Seek.Someone is 'on' and he counts to 100 standing by a post or a tree while everybody hides.When he can't find them they must try to run back to the post and shout"1 2 3{Blocky Off!"}If he sees them they must try to reach the post before he catches them .The game is over when either everyone has been caught or has reached the post safely.
